title: HOW TO DOUBLE YOUR POWER TO LEARN - Eugene M. Schwartz
description:
How to Double Your Power to Learn
by Eugene M. Schwartz
PDF FORMAT
 <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/B00005W3IW/4353-20" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/B00005W3IW/4353-20</a>

You don't have to be a scholar to learn...Fast, powerful learning of any subject you choose can be made easy (with) simple ACTIONS that make facts pop right into your mind...simple physical ACTIONS! Things you can do immediately. As simple as picking up a pencil. Opening a book the right way. Copying down problems on a piece of paper so that they half-solve themselves.

1. How to flash-read the printed page.

2. How to develop a tape-recorder memory.

3. How to build a power-packed vocabulary.

4. How to double your problem-solving ability.

5. How to burn facts, figures, whole books into your memory.

6. How to write simple, compelling English.

7. How to whiz right through the dozens of "make-or-break tests".
